main event: Unidentified flying objects were sighted over Okinawa on 22 April 1952.
interesting points: Sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The objects were described as elliptical-shaped, measuring 2-3 by 10 miles, maneuvering sporadically,The observed course of the objects was towards the west,The report concluded that the objects were probably balloons or possibly aircraft,There were multiple reports referencing unidentified flying objects in the region and their unusual maneuvers.
sighted object: three elliptical-shaped objects in the sky
witness description: Details on witnesses were not provided.
